name: datamonkey-mcp-sensory
description: MCP server providing sensory tools for Datamonkey (image inspection and system status).
localDevNotes: sharp and systeminformation require native Node APIs and are incompatible with Cloudflare Workers (and other edge runtimes). They were removed from runtime 'dependencies' and placed in 'optionalDependencies' so local Node-only tests can still install them when needed. For Node-only deployments or local testing, reinstall them in a Node-only package.json or run `npm install --no-optional` as desired. Do NOT include these packages in Worker runtime builds.
